selectionPrompt: Select only tech stories with a concrete 'what changed' (release, deprecation, CVE, API/policy change) and credible details (links, numbers, dates). Prefer primary sources and posts with changelogs, benchmarks, or CVE data. Skip teasers and rumor threads.
essencePrompt: Output 3 bullets: 1) What's new (one sentence), 2) Why it matters for engineers/teams, 3) Evidence (version numbers, CVEs, perf deltas) + gotcha if any. 60–120 words total.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑sentence views: 1) Operator takeaway (what to change in pipelines/config), 2) Security/DevOps check (risk or mitigation), 3) Adoption note (compatibility, rollout sequence).
